title: Where can I find help in writing a book? - Quora

response.answer_text: Are you wondering   to find the help for your book writing? If it's so then get the extra help   from the powered essay. Powered essay    has been providing awesome services regarding to the book writing   along with the best publication too. Booked a place here. http://www.poweredessays.com/book-report

Passion, Intelligence and 'Observation of humans and nature' make you the best writer. You have to surround yourself with worthy critics, and take truth from their criticisms and continue to refine your writings. Read more books. They act as reference points to judge your work vis-a-vis those books. Wish you all the best. May GOD bless you always. :-)
